column4: Hey how do i change my user josh's UID to 1003 properly without getting locked out of KDM in kubuntu?
Hey how do i change my user josh's UID to 1003 properly without getting locked out of KDM in kubuntu? I tried usermod -u 1003 josh but when i start up kubuntu im locked out
You also have to change ownership of all that user's files to the new UID.
